references.type: text of measure as reported in Senate

actions.text: Committee on Rules and Administration. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Schumer. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 188.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period October 1, 2013, through February 28, 2015.
subjects: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

summary.text: Provides that by September 20, 2013, each Senate committee shall report one resolution authorizing the committee to make expenditures out of the contingent fund of the Senate to defray its expenses, including the compensation of staff members, for October 1, 2013, through February 28, 2015. Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to report one authorization resolution containing more than one committee authorization resolution for such period.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period October 1, 2013, through February 28, 2015.
